[ICON_GOLD] Gold Coin [NewLine]

When Ah Cao, Ah Mu, and Ah Zhuan drink fuel next to each other, they will share it. [NewLine][NewLine][COLOR_Civ6Red] "Ah Cao, look to the right! ... That's the left, idiot!!" [NewLine] With one order, there were screams in two directions, three groups of screams, and wailing in all directions. [ENDCOLOR]

Acao, Amu, Azhuan and Builder +2 Construction Labor[NewLine][NewLine][COLOR_Civ6Red]"Undoubtedly, Captain Lucy is the best leader of the Calydonian Boars!"[NewLine]This is Amu's conclusion in the "Annual Work Report of the Sons of Calydon".[ENDCOLOR]

When Cao, Mu, and Zhuan receive battle damage, they will provide all their cities with [ICON_PRODUCTION] production progress equivalent to 10 activated trade routes. [NewLine][NewLine][COLOR_Civ6Red]"It would have been better if Captain Lucy had been gentler when she hit us." [NewLine] This was the second half of Mu's thoughts that he didn't dare to say. [ENDCOLOR]

If the leader has the most activated trade routes, each trade route will provide 1% [ICON_CULTURE] Civic Progress, 1% [ICON_SCIENCE] Research Progress [NewLine] [NewLine] [COLOR_Civ6Red] Rules and referees' ribs, one of which must be broken. [ENDCOLOR]

Each activated trade route provides 3 influence points per turn, and luxury resources in the territory provide 1 point of amenity for 3 additional cities. [ICON_Amenities] [NewLine] [NewLine] [COLOR_Civ6Red] Use honorifics to an opponent screaming under the bat, [NewLine] say sorry to an enemy crawling at your feet, [NewLine] this is the perfect etiquette of a thousand gold. [ENDCOLOR]

When you purchase a unit, it will provide 50% of the experience points required for upgrading all units of the same name and restore [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement and 50 health points [NewLine][NewLine][COLOR_Civ6Red]The piglets, known as the "Red Guards", are always at the forefront of the battle! [NewLine]It's hard to tell whether you were desperate or willing when you took off from the bat. [NewLine]Brave piglets, lead the way! [ENDCOLOR]
I can trust you...right?
snort.
Let me be frank with you. I am looking for you today because I have an additional commission.
Haha, I knew that you, who are also good at calculations, would be able to understand these principles.
Tsk...
Since it is a rampaging wild boar, there is no option to retreat.
I come, I see, I knock away.
I won't go back.
No...it's not a loss, just a temporary truce.
Since we have distinguished guests, let me entertain them.
Acao, Amu, Azhuan, please show me out!
The lady arrived on time.
...Is this the only trash talk you could come up with?
Idiot, that's not how you do it.
Hello. I am Luciana Oxis Theodore de Montef, son of Calydon.
You are the famous...
Do you want to go have something to eat or drink? I'll treat you.
Good day, Your Excellency.
It's not a bad feeling to be with you.
(Lucy's favor towards you has increased)
Please don't act like I care about you a lot, okay?
(Lucy's favor towards you has decreased)
I will always stand by what I love, and that includes bread...you.
For your sake, I will give the little wild boars a day off today.
Who told you to speak to me like that?
There are other important things to do right now, so we can put this matter aside for now.
I'll let the little wild boars take you there.
No way!
You can let me pass through here, right?
They are far inferior to my Red Mane Guards.
{LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_SOC_LUCIANA_ANY}
{LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_SOC_LUCIANA_ANY}
Luciana de Monteve
Luciana de Monteve

Lucy is currently in charge of the external commerce and wild boar management of the Sons of Calydon. Because her full name is too long and she doesn't want to be associated with her family, she calls herself Lucy in the Outer Ring. The three little pigs around her are named A Cao, A Mu and A Zhuan, and they are loyal to Lucy. Although Lucy usually uses a combination of swear words and honorifics, you can vaguely see the traces of a good education in her every move.
Lucy's family is very wealthy. She grew up in a privileged environment, and it seemed that everything in the world was within her reach, except freedom.

After being diagnosed with good etheric fitness, Lucy wanted to become a hollow investigator, but was strongly opposed by her family. After being scolded, insulted, locked up and subjected to cold violence, Lucy decided to run away from home and pursue freedom. [NewLine] "I will not go back! Once I am found by my family... there will be no more stars and seas, and I can only inherit the family business!"

Lucy has a strong desire to win, she loves to win and hates to lose. Currently, the person who made her lose the most is Caesar, so Lucy would challenge Caesar every now and then, and she would fight again and again, but she would lose again and again.
"Good day. Is there anything I can do for you, Miss Lao Ben?" [NewLine] "How can this be?! There is still such a nagging person!" [NewLine] "Acao Amu Azhuan! Get your weapons!"
"You have a distinguished guest, let me entertain him!"

+3 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route capacity, enemy units cannot plunder [ICON_TradeRoute] trade routes created by merchants of this civilization[NewLine] +3 [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement for Cao, Mu, and Zhuan, and permanently +2 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength after drinking fuel drink[NewLine] The [ICON_PRODUCTION] production progress provided by Cao, Mu, and Zhuan increases the activated trade route*2, and will obtain [ICON_GOLD] gold coins equivalent to 50% of the provided [ICON_PRODUCTION] production progress[NewLine] If the activated [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route is the most among all leaders, each trade route will provide 1% of the current [ICON_GOLD] gold coins

Golden Silk Lady's Lament
I come, I see, I knock away!

"You three should hide secretly in the motorcycle." [NewLine] "Let these idiots think they have found an ownerless treasure." [NewLine] "Wait until they let their guard down, and then kill them by surprise." [NewLine] "Ah, hey, hey! Didn't I tell you to do it now, idiots!"
Fuel Drink: +{Property}[ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength
Golden Silk Lady's Lament

The rebellious eldest daughter of the Montev family, who yearns for freedom and never succumbs to force, prefers to hold gold coins and luxury goods to ensure a "minimum" standard of living [NewLine] "At that moment, I saw "freedom""
